text: Böbikon was a municipality of the district Zurzach in the canton of Aargau in Switzerland. It is south of the border with Germany. On 1 January 2022, the former municipalities of Bad Zurzach, Baldingen, Böbikon, Kaiserstuhl, Rekingen, Rietheim, Rümikon and Wislikofen merged to form the new municipality of Zurzach. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website of Böbikon Category:Former municipalities of Aargau
title: Böbikon
